articles.content: On July 5, Zachtronics will be releasing Last Call BBS, a collection of stylish little puzzle games wrapped up in a retro PC gaming vibe. After 11 years in business (and even longer outside of commer… [+5811 chars]

articles.author: Frederic Lardinois
articles.title: AWS sent a Snowcone to space - TechCrunch
articles.description: At its re:Mars conference, Amazon today announced that it quietly sent one of its AWS Snowcone edge computing and storage devices into space on the Axiom mission to the International Space Station. For the most part, this was an off-the-shelf Snowcone, which …
articles.content:
